Name: Average time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in cases where it leads directly to a 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time to 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' from the start of the process
Metric: The average of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Payment Handled' in successful claims
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time to 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' grouped by 'org:resource'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' after 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time it takes 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' after the execution of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time it takes the 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to be done before 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in cases that require director approval
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case
